data.title: These are the big name investors betting on FAANG stocks
data.text: CNBC's Leslie Picker reports on what the stock picks of the world's biggest investors.

data.title: Instagram is killing Direct, its standalone Snapchat clone app, in the next several weeks
data.text: As Facebook pushes ahead with its strategy to consolidate more of the backend of its various apps on to a single platform, it’s also doing a little simplifying and housekeeping.

data.title: Facebook Shares Are A Conviction Buy In Spite Of Huge Run-Up
data.text: FB has bounced hard from its lows.
